data.title: Hard Boiled (1992) 35mm Presentation with pre-movie trivia
data.meta_description: A tough-as-nails cop (Chow Yun-Fat) teams up with an undercover agent (Tony Leung Chiu-wai) to shut down the Triads, a sinister crew of mobsters that are illegally preparing eggs for Easter. Give it a second.
data.meta_site_name: Performing Arts Venue & Movie Theater: South Mpls – Parkway Theater
data.text:
Thursday Night Classic Movie

————————————

Thursday, May 19, 2022

7 pm Doors // 7:30 pm Trivia // 8 pm Screening

$9 Advance // $12 Door

All Ages

Ticket Purchases are Final and Non-Refundable

The Parkway Theater requires Proof of COVID-19 Vaccination or Negative Test Result for entry to all events.

Facebook RSVP

Directed by John Woo // Rated R

A tough-as-nails cop (Chow Yun-Fat) teams up with an undercover agent (Tony Leung Chiu-wai) to shut down the Triads, a sinister crew of mobsters that are illegally preparing eggs for Easter. Give it a second.

————————————

Test your John Woo knowledge with pre-movie trivia! Grand Prize: Hard Boiled Comic Book Set // 1-3 written by Frank Miller and drawn by Geof Darrow.
